concept.title: 5306.302-4 International Agreement

conbody.p: (c) Limitations. The document referred to in DFARS 206.302-4(c) must be titled, “International Agreement Competitive Restrictions (IACR).” The authority to prepare an IACR is delegated from the HCA to the contracting officer (see MP5301.601(a)(i) ). The contracting officer must include the IACR and a copy of the associated Letter of Offer and Acceptance, once completed, in the contract file.
